metadata.description: Auto-fix registry for test failures. Maps error signatures to fixes.
metadata.usage: When a test fails, extract error signature -> look up in fixes -> apply fix

WB_COLOR_PICKER_MISSING_001.issue: wb-color-picker custom element not found in DOM

fix.action: Created complete WBColorPicker class extending HTMLElement and registered it
fix.code: class WBColorPicker extends HTMLElement { ... } customElements.define('wb-color-picker', WBColorPicker);

fix.action: Added class to element in constructor

WB_COLOR_PICKER_SHADOW_DOM_003.issue: Uses Light DOM only - no Shadow DOM
WB_COLOR_PICKER_SHADOW_DOM_003.cause: Shadow DOM usage requested to be removed

fix.action: Implemented Light DOM only - all elements created with document.createElement
Initialized services object with all required method bindings
fix.code: this.services = { open: this.open.bind(this), close: this.close.bind(this), toggle: this.toggle.bind(this), copyToClipboard: this.copyToClipboard.bind(this) }

WB_COLOR_PICKER_METHODS_005.issue: Missing open, close, toggle, copyToClipboard methods

fix.action: Implemented all 4 required methods
fix.code: // Code updated to match action: Implemented all 4 required methods

WB_COLOR_PICKER_OPEN_006.cause: Method not implemented in class definition

fix.action: Implemented open() method

WB_COLOR_PICKER_CLOSE_007.cause: Method not implemented in class definition

fix.action: Implemented close() method

WB_COLOR_PICKER_TOGGLE_008.cause: Method not implemented in class definition

fix.action: Implemented toggle() method

WB_COLOR_PICKER_COPY_CLIPBOARD_009.cause: Method not implemented in class definition

fix.action: Implemented copyToClipboard() using Clipboard API

WB_COLOR_PICKER_VALUE_GETTER_SETTER_010.cause: Getter/Setter pair not defined for 'value' property

fix.action: Implemented value getter and setter with attribute binding

WB_COLOR_PICKER_FORMAT_GETTER_SETTER_011.cause: Getter/Setter pair not defined for 'format' property

fix.action: Implemented format getter and setter

WB_COLOR_PICKER_DISABLED_GETTER_SETTER_0.cause: Getter/Setter pair not defined for 'disabled' property

fix.action: Implemented disabled getter and setter

WB_COLOR_PICKER_TRIGGER_ROLE_013.cause: Accessibility attribute 'role' not set on trigger element

fix.action: Set role='button' on trigger element

WB_COLOR_PICKER_ARIA_HASPOPUP_014.cause: Accessibility attribute 'aria-haspopup' not set on trigger element

fix.action: Set aria-haspopup='true' on trigger element

WB_PROPERTY_SELECT_RENDER_015.issue: Property editor renders object options as string '[object Object]'
WB_PROPERTY_SELECT_RENDER_015.cause: Render logic did not check if option was an object before rendering

fix.action: Updated renderPropertyControl to handle object options in select inputs
fix.code: const optValue = typeof opt === 'object' ? opt.value : opt; ...

WB_CODE_DUPLICATE_EXPORT_016.issue: Module had both named export and default export of same object
WB_CODE_DUPLICATE_EXPORT_016.cause: Refactoring left a legacy export default statement

fix.action: Removed duplicate 'export default' statement
fix.code: // Code updated to match action: Removed duplicate 'export default' statement

WB_MEDIA_BEHAVIOR_MISSING_017.issue: Media behavior was not properly registered/exported
WB_MEDIA_BEHAVIOR_MISSING_017.cause: Missing export statement in media.js or missing import in index.js

fix.action: Added missing behavior definition and export

WB_BUILDER_POS_UPDATE_018.errorSignature: Manual position update not reflected on canvas
WB_BUILDER_POS_UPDATE_018.issue: Changing _posX/_posY in property panel did not update component style immediately
WB_BUILDER_POS_UPDATE_018.cause: Property update handler (updP) did not map internal _pos keys to CSS styles

fix.action: Updated updP function to apply _posX, _posY, _zIndex, _width, _height to wrapper style
fix.verify: Manual property changes update canvas element position instantly

WB_AUDIO_SILENCE_CORS_019.errorSignature: Audio plays but is silent (Web Audio API CORS issue)
WB_AUDIO_SILENCE_CORS_019.issue: Using Web Audio API (EQ) with non-CORS audio source results in silence
WB_AUDIO_SILENCE_CORS_019.cause: Browser security policy prevents Web Audio API from accessing cross-origin audio data without CORS headers

fix.action: Added fallback mechanism: if CORS error occurs, disable EQ and reload audio without crossOrigin
fix.verify: Audio plays (without EQ) even if server doesn't support CORS

WB_TABLE_DUPLICATE_VAR_020.cause: Variable name reused in different scope/block causing compliance failure

fix.action: Renamed second occurrence to 'originalCellBg'
fix.verify: No duplicate variable declaration errors in compliance tests

WB_FIGURE_CAPTION_021.errorSignature: data-caption shows nothing on a figure element
WB_FIGURE_CAPTION_021.cause: Missing check for data-caption attribute in figure behavior

fix.action: Added logic to create figcaption from data-caption if missing
fix.verify: Figure renders caption from data-caption attribute

WB_AUDIO_EQ_CONTROLS_022.errorSignature: Play/Pause button should be present in EQ panel
WB_AUDIO_EQ_CONTROLS_022.issue: EQ panel missing play/pause button and master volume slider
WB_AUDIO_EQ_CONTROLS_022.cause: Controls row was missing from EQ panel construction

fix.action: Added controls row with Play/Pause button and Master Volume slider
fix.verify: EQ panel contains play button and volume slider

WB_CARD_CRASH_023.cause: ReferenceError: validateSemanticContainer used before definition or out of scope

fix.action: Moved validateSemanticContainer call to correct scope and ensured function availability
fix.verify: Card elements load without data-wb-error attribute

WB_CARD_PRODUCT_EVENT_024.issue: Product card CTA button did not dispatch expected event
WB_CARD_PRODUCT_EVENT_024.cause: Event dispatch logic missing from click handler

fix.action: Added CustomEvent dispatch on CTA button click
fix.verify: Clicking CTA dispatches wb:cardproduct:addtocart with product details

WB_CARD_CLICKABLE_TOGGLE_025.errorSignature: Clickable card does not toggle active state
WB_CARD_CLICKABLE_TOGGLE_025.issue: Clicking a card with data-clickable="true" did not toggle visual state
WB_CARD_CLICKABLE_TOGGLE_025.cause: Missing click handler to toggle 'wb-card--active' class

fix.action: Added click event listener to toggle class

WB_CARD_SYNTAX_ERROR_026.cause: Typo during refactoring: 'const emaiclassName =' instead of 'const emailLink ='

fix.action: Corrected variable declaration and usage

WB_CARD_COMPLIANCE_CLASSES_027.issue: Missing specific CSS classes required by tests
WB_CARD_COMPLIANCE_CLASSES_027.cause: Classes like 'wb-card--align-left', 'wb-card--overlay-bottom' were not being added

fix.action: Added missing classList.add calls for alignment and overlay positions

WB_MISSING_BEHAVIORS_028.issue: Missing behavior files referenced in index
WB_MISSING_BEHAVIORS_028.cause: Files globe.js, scroll-progress.js, slider.js did not exist

fix.action: Created missing behavior files and exported them
fix.verify: Files exist and can be imported
fix.code:
// Created file: src/behaviors/js/globe.js
export default function globe(el) { ... }

WB_RATING_NOT_IMPLEMENTED_029.issue: Rating behavior was a stub (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)
WB_RATING_NOT_IMPLEMENTED_029.cause: Missing implementation of star rendering and interaction logic

fix.action: Implemented full star rating component with hover effects and events
fix.verify: Stars render and respond to clicks
fix.code:
element.innerHTML = '★★★★★';
// Added click handlers for rating

WB_CARD_BOOLEAN_PARSING_030.issue: Boolean attributes (e.g. data-clickable) ignored when empty string
WB_CARD_BOOLEAN_PARSING_030.cause: Object spread precedence issue and missing empty string handling

fix.action: Moved ...options to start of config merge and added parseBoolean helper

WB_DEMO_CARD_SYNTAX_031.cause: Missing closing braces in forEach loop during refactor

fix.action: Recreated file with correct syntax and ID-based event listeners

WB_CORE_ASYNC_LOADING_032.issue: Tests failing due to race condition between behavior loading and assertions
WB_CORE_ASYNC_LOADING_032.cause: WB.scan and WB.inject were synchronous but behaviors load asynchronously

fix.action: Updated WB.inject and WB.scan to be async and await behavior loading

WB_TEXTAREA_DUPLICATE_VAR_033.errorSignature: SyntaxError: Identifier 'wrapper' has already been declared
WB_TEXTAREA_DUPLICATE_VAR_033.issue: Duplicate variable declaration in cleanup function

fix.action: Renamed variable in cleanup function to 'cleanupWrapper'

WB_SERVER_MISSING_CONFIG_034.issue: Missing configuration files caused server errors
WB_SERVER_MISSING_CONFIG_034.cause: Files not present in data/ directory

fix.action: Created missing configuration files with default schemas

WB_SERVER_API_METHOD_035.cause: Using outdated server.js that lacked POST handlers

fix.action: Updated server.js to include /api/log-issues, /api/upload, and WebSocket support

WB_SEMANTICS_LIST_MISSING_036.cause: The 'list' behavior is a core semantic component required by the 'semantics-new.spec.ts' compliance test. It was missing from the codebase because the initial migration from the prototype did not include the semantic list implementation, resulting in a runtime error when the test attempted to load 'list.js'.

fix.action: Created list behavior with support for comma-separated and JSON items
Created desclist behavior for description lists
Created empty state behavior
fix.verify: Empty state renders with icon and message

WB_CODE_PRE_ERROR_039.issue: Code behavior failed when applied to <pre> tag
WB_CODE_PRE_ERROR_039.cause: Code behavior threw error on <pre> tags because it strictly expected <code> tags

fix.action: Updated code behavior to delegate to pre behavior when on <pre> tag

WB_REGISTRY_ALIASES_040.issue: Incorrect aliases in registry prevented loading
WB_REGISTRY_ALIASES_040.cause: Registry alias 'ul' -> 'list' conflicted with direct 'list' export, causing resolution failure

fix.action: Removed incorrect aliases for list and desclist
fix.code:
export { default as list } from './semantics/list.js';
// Removed alias: ul: list

WB_SEMANTICS_LIST_JSON_041.issue: List behavior only supported comma-separated strings
WB_SEMANTICS_LIST_JSON_041.cause: Parsing logic relied on simple comma splitting, which failed when list items contained commas (e.g. JSON objects)

fix.action: Added JSON parsing support for data-items
fix.verify: List accepts JSON arrays with commas in items

fix.action: Created stat behavior
Created timeline behavior
Created json behavior

WB_TEST_WINDOW_ADD_TYPE_045.errorSignature: Property 'add' does not exist on type 'Window & typeof globalThis'
WB_TEST_WINDOW_ADD_TYPE_045.issue: TypeScript error when accessing window.add in tests
WB_TEST_WINDOW_ADD_TYPE_045.cause: window object in TypeScript doesn't have add property defined

fix.action: Cast window to any before accessing add property

WB_ABBREVIATION_WB_UNDEFINED_049.issue: Line 5: First use of 'WB' abbreviation not properly defined with full form

fix.action: Change line 5 to define WB: 'Web Behaviors (WB)' before using it

WB_CSS_IMPORTANT_OVERUSE_050.errorSignature: Total !important usage should be minimal - Found: 51, Expected: < 50
WB_CSS_IMPORTANT_OVERUSE_050.issue: One extra !important declaration in CSS files

fix.action: Find one !important and remove it or refactor to avoid

WB_VIEWS_KITCHEN_SINK_NO_NAME_051.errorSignature: [WB Views] No view name found - 18 errors
WB_VIEWS_KITCHEN_SINK_NO_NAME_051.issue: wb-views elements missing proper view name attribute

fix.action: Find all <wb-views> tags and ensure each has a proper view name

WB_VIEWS_UNIFIED_COMPONENTS_NO_NAME_052.errorSignature: [WB Views] No view name found - 8 errors
WB_VIEWS_UNIFIED_COMPONENTS_NO_NAME_052.issue: wb-views elements missing proper view name attribute

fix.action: Find all <wb-views> tags and ensure each has a proper view name

WB_PAGE_DEMOS_NAVIGATION_DESTROYED_053.errorSignature: Execution context was destroyed, most likely because of a navigation
WB_PAGE_DEMOS_NAVIGATION_DESTROYED_053.issue: Page navigation causes test execution context to be destroyed
WB_PAGE_DEMOS_NAVIGATION_DESTROYED_053.cause: pages/demos.html may contain links that trigger navigation during test

fix.action: Add waitForLoadState after setting dark mode, or prevent unwanted navigation
fix.verify: dark-mode test completes without context destruction

WB_BUILDER_COMPONENTS_JSON_404_054.issue: builder.html loads but fails to fetch components.json, causing console error
WB_BUILDER_COMPONENTS_JSON_404_054.cause: components.json file missing from src/builder/ or not served by server

fix.action: Create src/builder/components.json or add route in server.js to serve it

WB_DOCS_MANIFEST_BUILDER_TREE_MISSING_05.errorSignature: Found markdown file not in manifest: builder/builder-tree.md
WB_DOCS_MANIFEST_BUILDER_TREE_MISSING_05.issue: docs/builder/builder-tree.md exists but not listed in docs/manifest.json
WB_DOCS_MANIFEST_BUILDER_TREE_MISSING_05.cause: New doc file created without updating manifest

fix.action: Add entry for builder/builder-tree.md to appropriate category

WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_ERROR_LOG_056.errorSignature: 2 runtime errors: 'Legacy syntax detected on <div>. Please use <wb-card> instead.'
WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_ERROR_LOG_056.issue: index.html contains legacy data-wb="card" syntax that triggers errors
WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_ERROR_LOG_056.cause: Home page uses old syntax instead of new <wb-card> component

fix.action: Replace data-wb='card' with <wb-card> or remove legacy cards

WB_HOME_PAGE_MISSING_MODAL_BUTTON_057.issue: Home page missing 'Open Modal' button in live demo section
WB_HOME_PAGE_MISSING_MODAL_BUTTON_057.cause: Glass card demo section incomplete or button missing

fix.action: Add <wb-button>Open Modal</wb-button> to live demo section with glass card

WB_DUPLICATE_VARIABLES_BUILDER_APP_058.cause: Variables redeclared in different scopes (el, element, dropped, etc.)

fix.action: Scan file for duplicate variable declarations and consolidate/rename them. Focus on: el, element, dropped

WB_MISSING_BASE_CLASSES_BEHAVIORS_059.issue: 65 behavior functions don't add baseClass from schema
WB_MISSING_BASE_CLASSES_BEHAVIORS_059.cause: Behaviors not properly adding classList.add(baseClass) from their schema

fix.action: Review 65 behavior functions and add: element.classList.add(config.behavior) or similar baseClass from schema

WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_NOT_THROWING_ERROR_060.errorSignature: Should throw error for legacy data-wb usage but doesn't
WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_NOT_THROWING_ERROR_060.issue: Legacy syntax data-wb="card" not triggering expected error message
WB_LEGACY_SYNTAX_NOT_THROWING_ERROR_060.cause: Strict mode error handling not detecting or logging legacy syntax

fix.action: Ensure legacy data-wb attributes trigger 'Legacy syntax detected' error log
fix.verify: strict-mode-runtime test detects and logs legacy syntax error

WB_DOCS_MANIFEST_MISSING_FILE_046.issue: Markdown files exist in docs/ but are missing from manifest.json
WB_DOCS_MANIFEST_MISSING_FILE_046.cause: New documentation files were created but not registered in the manifest

fix.action: Run scripts/update-docs-manifest.js to scan docs directory and update manifest.json
fix.verify: All .md files are present in manifest.json

WB_SCROLLALONG_LAYOUT_BREAK_047.errorSignature: Global layout broken (sidebar/main content scrolling sync)
WB_SCROLLALONG_LAYOUT_BREAK_047.issue: scrollalong behavior modified global layout styles (.site__body, .site__main), breaking the app shell
WB_SCROLLALONG_LAYOUT_BREAK_047.cause: Behavior attempted to enable global scrolling by modifying parent containers, violating the rule of isolation (behaviors should only affect their target element)

fix.action: Reverted global style changes. Restricted behavior to only apply position: sticky to the target element.
fix.verify: Sidebar is sticky but main content layout remains independent
fix.code: element.style.position = 'sticky'; element.style.top = '0'; // No global side effects

WB_DOC_VIEWER_PATH_RESOLUTION_048.errorSignature: Documentation links fail to load - 'Failed to load: /docs/...' errors
WB_DOC_VIEWER_PATH_RESOLUTION_048.issue: Documentation viewer (doc-viewer.html) failed to load markdown files with poor error messages
WB_DOC_VIEWER_PATH_RESOLUTION_048.cause: mdhtml.js had no path normalization logic and displayed generic error messages without file paths or HTTP status codes, making debugging impossible

fix.action: Added smart path handling + detailed error messages + console logging
details: ✓ Automatically prepends '/' to relative paths (handles both docs/file.md and /docs/file.md)
✓ Supports HTTP URLs as-is without modification
✓ Shows detailed error with file path, HTTP status, and troubleshooting tips
✓ Console logs fetch attempts and success with file size
✓ Dispatches new wb:mdhtml:error event on failure
fix.verify: Documentation loads without errors; error messages are clear and helpful
fix.code: let fetchPath = config.src; if (!fetchPath.startsWith('/') && !fetchPath.startsWith('http')) { fetchPath = '/' + fetchPath; } console.log('[mdhtml] Fetching:', fetchPath);
fix.errorDisplay: Shows file path, HTTP status, and troubleshooting steps in styled error box

filesCreated.description: Complete WBColorPicker custom element - Light DOM, all methods, getters/setters, ARIA
Complete styling for wb-color-picker with dark mode
